name: EGE DistantPlanet NonXXX
description:
SiFi Interactive Room with integrated VideoPlayer and beautiful Girl who will tell you a story, how humanity went into space.
This is. In this experience you can:
Take out girl out of hibernation pod,
control Where the girl should go,
you can make the girl dance,sit, and exercise
you can also spawn detectable objects
The experience has also integrated file browsers with video player, (also direct loading of ogg audio file from game folder).
This experience has no gameplay dynamic, its VR experience to relax and chill out.
